page.title: 03An Interview with Jessie
page.content: {Mrs. Jessie Haley}kindly let us interview her in her{fashion shop}at {Howden-le-Wear.}She started her first shop in 1954 at Howden-le-Wear selling small things such as wool, aprons etc. Today in 1985 she has three very modern fashion shops,in Crook,Bishop Auckland and Howden-le-Wear.The things that she sells now are up to the minute fashion and accessories.She selects all the fashions herself and only sells the things she likes.She tries to employ smart,helpful and intelligent people aged between 25 and 40.The{prices}range from{80p}for a necklace to{Â£148}for a dress.She sells the same things in all of her shops to make buying easier.A credit card system is in use at her shops. Unfortunatley she is retiring in 1987 and is selling {all}of her shops.
